Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"

 I still havent gotten Yans post attacking me, so I guess Ill have to post a 
reply to it from memory.

       Rampage watched the larger bot running towrd him. With his gun 
currently several feet to his left, he couldnt blast the attacker. Instead, 
he looked at the bots large, tall legs and slammed forward, wrapping his 
strong arms around the bots legs, and crushing them as hard as he could, 
trying to listen to the gentle cracking of the metallic bones inside.

       Inferno, in flight mode with his abdomen ablaze, sent fireballs 
raining down on the attackers, and watching Rampage tackle the other bot.

       Paralysis, too, fired on some of the attackers. He could smell another 
bt, but he didnt know where it was coming from....Scather mabey? He turned on 
his infrared sight, but it didnt help. He would have to use his nose and went 
closer to the smell, armed.

       Tankkor, still in his tank mode was hit with the return fire, but in 
his tank mode the armor covered more then in his bot form, so he could last a 
bit longer with the cross fire. He turned his head back to the agressor, and 
slid open his own dual set of rocket launchers and sent them screaming at 
Endbringer.

--part1_16.60a22c3.27693379_boundary
